content.text:
Event: Beach Hazards Statement
Area: Catalina and Santa Barbara Islands; Ventura County Beaches; Malibu Coast; Los Angeles County Beaches; Palos Verdes Hills
Severity: Moderate
Description: * WHAT...Elevated surf of 3 to 6 feet with isolated sets to 7
feet, along with dangerous rip currents and breaking waves.

* WHERE...Catalina and Santa Barbara Islands, Ventura County
Beaches, Malibu Coast, Los Angeles County Beaches and Palos
Verdes Hills.

* WHEN...Through this evening.

* IMPACTS...There is an increased risk of ocean drowning. Rip
currents can pull swimmers and surfers out to sea. Waves can
wash people off beaches and rocks, and capsize small boats
nearshore.
Instructions: Remain out of the water due to hazardous swimming conditions, or
stay near occupied lifeguard towers. Rock jetties can be deadly
locations in such conditions, so stay off the rocks.

---

Event: Beach Hazards Statement
Area: Orange County Coastal
Severity: Moderate
Description: * WHAT...Elevated surf of 3 to 6 feet with local sets to 7 feet,
and dangerous rip currents expected.

* WHERE...Orange County Coastal Areas.

* WHEN...From 5 AM PDT early this morning through this evening.

* IMPACTS...Dangerous swimming and surfing conditions due to
strong rip currents.
Instructions: Remain out of the water to avoid hazardous swimming conditions.
